content:
Hello ! I’m learning everything webassembly for 3 days, my head’s gonna explode but I think I’m not that far to succeed! I think so.

When, from a guest, you are generating from a wit. You make your struct, your methods implementing the generated interface… but why are there not self references anymore ?

This would be so helpful to create wasm programs which are more than a « call and return »
bachrc has marked this topic as resolved.

Sorry, I saw this is a duplicate topic, discovering Zulip.
Gonna continue the discussion in #wit-bindgen
